1525330800_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92T.body: China is pretty stubborn, and sexually confused. Maybe it's better to let it do its own thing

1525483017_1EHjrNgbVBWHQ7BiKwqKD6pSbowep.body: we can talk about this forever
what im trying to say is. this can't go on forever
we're gonna have to make a decision. i will not stay here forever
i need to go home at least by monday
This could be a surrogate political prison.
But then. these days you can never really distinguish real from fake.

1525488037_1EHjrNgbVBWHQ7BiKwqKD6pSbowep.body: Hell is real.. but you will be saved from hell if you truly care about the world. It's not forever.. but it could go on forever if you refuse to save the world. Jesus saves people from hell only one hand at a time.

no more stabbing in the back. we cooperate, or thats the end of the species
